title: PGCIL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 48 Company Secretary Professional Posts
description: The Power Grid Corporation of India Limited (PGCIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 48 Company Secretary Professional Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, 12th, can apply for the PGCIL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selectio...
